SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Interface ServerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientRmiAdapter, ServerSocketImpl
public interface ServerInterface

Defines how a server is exposed on the network

More precisely inside this class are stored and displayed all actions allowed by a server that a client can perform.

Since:
27/04/2023
Version:
2.0
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi

    • dragTilesToBookShelf

      void dragTilesToBookShelf(List<Coordinate> chosenTiles, int chosenColumn)
      Defines the action of dragging the tiles from the board to the bookshelf
      Parameters:
      chosenTiles - the tiles drawn by the living-room board
      chosenColumn - the column in which the tiles will be putted

    • joinGame

      Defines the action to do when a player (identified by his nickname) try to join a match
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player that is trying to join the game

    • createGame

      void createGame(String nickname, int numberOfPlayer)
      Defines the action to do when a player (identified by his nickname) wants to create a match
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player that wats to create a match
      numberOfPlayer - the number of players that can join the match that the player wants to create
      See Also:
      • Player

      Defines the action to do when a player (identified by his nickname) wants to send a message to the other players (one or more).

      text - the text of the message
      receiversNickname - aa array of receivers' nickname
